LanguageData.Hediffs_Intellectual.label: Research Knowledge
LanguageData.Hediffs_Intellectual.description: Kenkyū no Kokoroe (Research Knowledge): I eat with gratitude for all the ingredients in the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
